title: style lamb chops
description: A perfect weeknight supper - simple, flavourful chop served with lots of healthy Mediterranean vegetables and a little feta.This meal is low calorie  and provides 200 kcal, 9g protein, 15g carbohydrate (of which 14g sugars), 11.5g fat (of which 4g saturates), 7g fibre and 0.8g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 red peppers, cut into large chunks
2 yellow peppers, cut into large chunks
